name: Assist at the Inn
description: The innkeeper needs help with various tasks around the establishment.

approaches.name: Handle Maintenance
approaches.description: Repair furniture, clean rooms, and tend to physical needs of the inn.

approaches.name: Organize Inventory
approaches.description: Sort supplies, maintain ledgers, and track stock.

approaches.name: Attend to Guests
approaches.description: Serve customers, handle requests, and manage social aspects of inn operation.

name: Investigate Merchant Theft
description: A local merchant has reported missing items and suspects theft. Investigate the situation.

initialStep.name: Question Witnesses
initialStep.description: Gather information from people in the marketplace about the missing goods.

approaches.name: Intimidating Presence
approaches.description: Use physical presence to pressure witnesses into talking.

approaches.name: Analytical Questioning
approaches.description: Apply logical reasoning to extract consistent information.

approaches.name: Sympathetic Listening
approaches.description: Build rapport and encourage witnesses to share what they know.
